LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_HeraldPack.label: Herald Backpack
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_HeraldPack.description: A mostly Decorative Backpack can be used to deploy shield recharger.
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_HeraldLieutenantHelmet.label: Herald Helmet
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_HeraldLieutenantHelmet.descr: A helmet that uses gravitational manipulation to protect the wearer, used by most Heralds.
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_HeraldLieutenantArmor.label: Voice of TKet Armor
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_HeraldLieutenantArmor.descri: Ceremonial armor for the Voice of TKet, the Regional commander of the Herald.
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_ArmorHelmetHerald.label: Voice of TKet Helmet
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_ArmorHelmetHerald.descriptio: Ceremonial Helmet for the first Herald, the wearer is trated as the Voice of TKet.
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_ArmorHerald.label: Herald Armor
LanguageData.AAD_Apparel_ArmorHerald.description: Standard power armor used by Heralds.
